verses.text: And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* to \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and to all his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, that they should \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

But \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w delighted|strong="H2654"\w* \w much|strong="H3966"\w* in \w David|strong="H1732"\w*: and \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w seeketh|strong="H1245"\w* to \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* thee: now therefore, I pray thee, take \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* to thyself until the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and \w abide|strong="H3427"\w* in a \w secret|strong="H5643"\w* \add place\add*, and \w hide|strong="H2244"\w* thyself:

And I will go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* and \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w beside|strong="H3027"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* where thou \add art\add*, and I will \w commune|strong="H1696"\w* with my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of thee; and \w what|strong="H4100"\w* I \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, that I will \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* thee.

¶ And \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* unto \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Let not the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* against his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, against \w David|strong="H1732"\w*; because he hath not \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against thee, and because his \w works|strong="H4639"\w* \add have been\add* to \w thee-ward very|strong="H3966"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*:

For he did \w put|strong="H7760"\w* his \w life|strong="H5315"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3709"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w salvation|strong="H8668"\w* for all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: thou \w sawest|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, and didst \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*: wherefore then wilt thou \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* against \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, to \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* without a \w cause|strong="H2600"\w*?

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*: and \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w*, \add As\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, he shall \w not|strong="H0518"\w* be \w slain|strong="H4191"\w*.

And \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w shewed|strong="H5046"\w* him all those \w things|strong="H1697"\w*. And \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* to \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and he was in his \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*, as in times \w past|strong="H0865"\w*.\f + \fr 19.7 \ft in times…: Heb. yesterday, third day\f*

¶ And there was \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w*: and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* with the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* them with a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4347"\w*; and they \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* him.\f + \fr 19.8 \ft him: Heb. his face\f*

And the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was upon \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, as he \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* in his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* with his \w javelin|strong="H2595"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w played|strong="H5059"\w* with \add his\add* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* to \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* even to the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* with the \w javelin|strong="H2595"\w*; but he slipped \w away|strong="H6362"\w* out of \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*, and he \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w javelin|strong="H2595"\w* into the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*: and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*, and \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w* that \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

\w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* also \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* unto \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, to \w watch|strong="H8104"\w* him, and to \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* him in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*: and \w Michal|strong="H4324"\w* \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, If thou \w save|strong="H4422"\w* not thy \w life|strong="H5315"\w* to \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* thou shalt be \w slain|strong="H4191"\w*.

¶ So \w Michal|strong="H4324"\w* \w let|strong="H3381"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* through a \w window|strong="H2474"\w*: and he \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w fled|strong="H1272"\w*, and \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w*.

And \w Michal|strong="H4324"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* an \w image|strong="H8655"\w*, and \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* in the \w bed|strong="H4296"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* a \w pillow|strong="H3523"\w* of \w goats’|strong="H5795"\w* \add hair\add* for his \w bolster|strong="H4763"\w*, and \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \add it\add* with a \w cloth|strong="H0899"\w*.\f + \fr 19.13 \ft image: Heb. teraphim\f*

And when \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* to \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, He \add is\add* \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*.

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* the \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \add again\add* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Bring him \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to me in the \w bed|strong="H4296"\w*, that I may \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* him.

And when the \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* were come \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, behold, \add there was\add* an \w image|strong="H8655"\w* in the \w bed|strong="H4296"\w*, with a \w pillow|strong="H3523"\w* of \w goats’|strong="H5795"\w* \add hair\add* for his \w bolster|strong="H4763"\w*.

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Michal|strong="H4324"\w*, Why hast thou deceived me \w so|strong="H7411"\w*, and sent \w away|strong="H7971"\w* mine \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*, that he is \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w*? And \w Michal|strong="H4324"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, He \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Let me \w go|strong="H7971"\w*; why should I \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* thee?

¶ So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w*, and \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* to \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*, and \w told|strong="H5046"\w* him all that \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to him. And he and \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Naioth|strong="H5121"\w*.

And it was \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \add is\add* at \w Naioth|strong="H5121"\w* in \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*.

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* to \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*: and when they \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w company|strong="H3862"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w prophesying|strong="H5012"\w*, and \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \add as\add* \w appointed|strong="H5324"\w* over them, the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* was upon the \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and they also \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w*.

And when it was \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w*, and they \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* likewise. And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w* the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* time, and they \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* also.

Then \w went|strong="H3212"\w* he also to \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w well|strong="H0953"\w* that \add is\add* in \w Sechu|strong="H7906"\w*: and he \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Where|strong="H0375"\w* \add are\add* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* and \w David|strong="H1732"\w*? And \add one\add* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, \add they be\add* at \w Naioth|strong="H5121"\w* in \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*.

And he \w went|strong="H3212"\w* thither to \w Naioth|strong="H5121"\w* in \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*: and the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* was upon him also, and he \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w*, and \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w*, until he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Naioth|strong="H5121"\w* in \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*.

And he stripped \w off|strong="H6584"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w*, and \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* in like manner, and lay \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w naked|strong="H6174"\w* all that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* and all that \w night|strong="H3915"\w*. Wherefore they \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Is\add* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* also among the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*?\f + \fr 19.24 \ft lay: Heb. fell\f*
